name: Art in Chicago - Bottle Cap Magnets - Set of 5
description:
During our trip to Chicago we ended up at the art museum one afternoon. It was a must on our list! We had wonderful weather and just too much walking for my boyfriend to handle. We walked and walked and walked and then the last day we discovered the free trolley!

Set of five (5) bottle cap magnets made with my own photos that I took during a trip to Chicago. 

Images include the view of the city, artwork and more. 

Each bottle cap is approximately 1 1/4" across. These flattened bottle cap magnets are great for holding up your favorite photos or postcards. 

(photographs were taken before magnets were attached to bottle caps so they wouldn't stick together)

© 2011 All products, photography, graphics and text are the property of Shana's Shop.

name: I Love NYC - Bottle Cap Magnets - Set of 5
description:
Do you love New York City? These magnets will look great on your fridge or magnet board and remind you of this exciting city every time you see them!!

Set of five (5) bottle cap magnets made with my own photos that I took during a trip to New York. 

Images include the Statue of Liberty, the Flatiron building, the Chrysler building and more. 

Each bottle cap is approximately 1 1/4" across. These flattened bottle cap magnets are great for holding up your favorite photos or postcards. 

(photographs were taken before magnets were attached to bottle caps so they wouldn't stick together)

© 2011 All products, photography, graphics and text are the property of Shana's Shop.

name: Trekking around Peru - Bottle Cap Magnets - Set of 5
description:
What an adventure to see Manchu Picchu! After I caught my breath I just stood there and took in the view. Yes, I had to catch my breath most of the time I was hiking around on this trip. 

This is a set of of five (5) bottle cap magnets made with my own photographs from a trip I took to South America. The last stop was Peru. We stayed in Aguas Calientes for a few days. There were lovely hikes as we discovered the area, a day exploring the ruins at Manchu Picchu (in the rain) and an afternoon relaxing in the hot spring pools.

Images include Manchu Picchu, fern leaves, fresh fruit at the market and more. 

Each bottle cap is approximately 1 1/4" across. These flattened bottle cap magnets are great for holding up your favorite photos or postcards. 

(photographs were taken before magnets were attached to bottle caps so they wouldn't stick together)

© 2011 All products, photography, graphics and text are the property of Shana's Shop.

name: A Sunny day in Seattle - Bottle Cap Magnets - Set of 5From ShanasShop
description:
I know, you don't believe it, right? After a week long visit to Seattle we finally had a beautiful sunny day to enjoy the city and best of all go up in the Space Needle and enjoy the view! If you love Seattle this magnet set will look great on your fridge or magnet board and remind you of all the fun you have in the city every time you see them!!

Set of five (5) bottle cap magnets made with my own photos that I took during a trip to Seattle. 

Images include the Space Needle, views of the city and more. 

Each bottle cap is approximately 1 1/4" across. These flattened bottle cap magnets are great for holding up your favorite photos or postcards. 

(photographs were taken before magnets were attached to bottle caps so they wouldn't stick together)

© 2011 All products, photography, graphics and text are the property of Shana's Shop.
